pages.text: While closely associated with fairies, pereskia originated in our world before it was transplanted into the fey realm.$(br2)Once recreated in the heat of a $(l:crafting/pyres)pyre$(), the bulb can be extracted to make it $(l:herbs/pereskia#renew)renewable$().$(br2)Commonly associated with protection, order & light, its bulbs $(l:resources/roasted_pereskia)make a fine meal$() when cooked.

pages.title: Renewability
pages.text: Extracting the bulb from the perskia plant itself is simple. The bulb can be planted on any type of farmland that supports normal crops.$(br2)When mature, it forms a brilliant pink flower with a sweet scent.
